subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: After a slow start, Rafael Nadal powered past Martin Klizan in his first-round match at Wimbledon. Roger Federer, Serena Williams and Maria Sharapova also won easily.
snippet: After a slow start, Rafael Nadal powered past Martin Klizan in his first-round match at Wimbledon. Roger Federer, Serena Williams and Maria Sharapova also won easily.
